Even for children with autism these puzzle help them develops there memory, attention, logical thinking, fine hand motor skills and just entertains kids.
This is game which has the best graphics so that kids can enjoy it. The learning will be fun.

Have fun and enjoy while learning and play with animals puzzles.

Enjoy it!

title: ABC Phonics with Animals Puzzle

creator: Tiny Toys Apps
descriptionHtml:
What are thing your kids gets from this Puzzle game

This ABC Phonics with Animals Puzzle game will help kids to develop their following skills

1. Learn English letter and their phonic sound
2. Fine motor skills
3. Puzzle solving skill
4. Develops their memory
5. Visual perception
6. Learn about Animals
7. Attention skill
8. Logical thinking skill
9. Entertainment and joy

This game contain more than 60+ animal puzzles and phonics sound for all the letters. This very enjoyable and fun educational game. Preschool children and toddlers and also this will help to develop skill of kids with autism.


Why kids need to learn phonics

It is all about how to read English word phonetically. If child learn phonic they don’t need memories words to read it, they only need to know about letter and phonics sound of it. (Phonics sound only)
If child know phonic well they can try to spell any word in English.
This is first step, from this it will teach them about letter sound of English alphabet
There are other ways to teach English reading but if we use phonic for this children read most of words without memorizing them, and also this is proven method by research

What are the benefit of the fine motor skills?

Fine motor skill are the coordination between small muscles which control the hand, fingers and thumb with the eyes. Fine motor skills involve the small muscles of the body that enable such functions as writing, combine small object parts with fingers. On this ABC Phonics with Animals Puzzle they need use their fingers to collect animals puzzle parts and create animal, which involves a lot of hand and eye manipulation.
It’s better to start building their fine motor skills early on. Fine motor skills will develop and improve as they move through childhood. It just takes the right kind of practice.

Puzzle solving skill & develops their memory

Simple Puzzle can help children learn about manipulating objects through turning, placing and flipping pieces. This will kids increase memory problem solving skills
Completing a puzzle, even the most simplest of puzzles sets a single goal to achieve. Toddlers and children must think and develop strategies on how to approach in achieving this goal. This process involves problem solving, reasoning skills and developing solutions which they can later be transferred into their personal/adult life.

Visual perception

Visual perception refers to the brain’s ability to make sense of what the eyes see. When working on puzzles, present one piece at a time and cover unneeded pieces of the puzzle. Kids need to figure out total animal shape and then they need to combine all the part to complete animal. On this process kids’ brain need to visually figure out each separate animals puzzle parts.

Learn about Animals

From this ABC Phonics with Animals Puzzle game kids can learn about animal and their names and their living environment. Kids may love to learn about these animals.
Attention skill and Logical thinking skill
Kids need to keep attention when they solving animal puzzle, and also when combining each part they need to have logical thinking ability.

Features
Contains 60+ Animal puzzles and their names
Phonics sound of all the Alphabet letter
Introduce all English simple letter with their phonics
Nice and beautiful background which related to each animal living environment
Cute cartoon animal illustrations.
Sweet background music and sounds.
Nice balloon popup when kids finished each puzzle

The game is suitable for toddlers or kids under 5 years and this will free with ads therefore kids not getting annoying during the game play.

Even for children with autism these puzzle help them develops there memory, attention, logical thinking, fine hand motor skills and just entertains kids.
This is game which has the best graphics so that kids can enjoy it. The learning will be fun.

Have fun and enjoy while learning and play with animals puzzles.

Enjoy it!
descriptionShort: Kids learn alphabets and there phonics sound while playing with animals puzzles.

title: ABC Phonics with Animals Puzzle

creator: Tiny Toys Apps
descriptionHtml:
This ABC Phonics with Animals Puzzle game will help your kids, to develop their following skills

1. Learn English letter and their phonic sound
2. Fine motor skills
3. Puzzle solving skill
4. Develops their memory
5. Visual perception
6. Learn about Animals
7. Attention skill
8. Logical thinking skill
9. Entertainment and joy

This game contains more than 60 + animal puzzles and phonics for all the letters. This is a very enjoyable and fun educational game for Preschool children and toddlers, and this will also help develop children's skills with autism.

Why kids should learn phonics.

It is all about phonetic reading of English words. If a child learns phonics they don't have to memorize words to read it, they only need to know about its letter and phonics sound. (Phonics sounds only)
If a child knows phonic well they can try spelling any English word.
This is the first step, from this it will teach them English alphabet letter sound.
There are other ways to teach English reading, but if we use phonic for these children, they can read most of the words without memorizing them, and this is also a proven method of research.

What are the benefits of fine motor skills?

Fine motor skills are the coordination between small muscles that control the hands, fingers and thumb through eyes. Fine motor skills involve the small muscles of the body that allow such functions as writing, combining small parts of the object with fingers. On this ABC Phonics with Animals Puzzle, they need to use their fingers to collect parts of animal puzzles and create animals that involve a lot of hand and eye manipulation.

It's better to start building their fine motor skills early. Fine motor skills develop and improve as they move through childhood. It's just going to take the right kind of practice.

Puzzle solving skill & develops their memory

Simple Puzzle can help children learn how to manipulate objects by turning, placing and flipping pieces. This will increase memory problem solving skills.

The completion of a puzzle, even the simplest of puzzles, sets a single goal to be achieved. Toddlers and children must think and develop strategies on how to approach in achieving this goal. This process involves problem-solving, reasoning skills and developing solutions that can be later transferred to their personal / adult life.

Visual perception

Visual perception refers to the ability of the brain to make sense of what the eyes see. When working on puzzles, present one piece at a time and cover the unnecessary pieces of the puzzle. Kids need to figure out the overall shape of the animal, and then they need to combine all the parts to complete the animal. In this process, children's brains need to visually figure out the parts of each individual animal's puzzle.

Learn about Animals.

From this ABC Phonics with Animals Puzzle game, kids can learn about animals, their names and their living environment.

Attention skill and Logical thinking skill

Kids need to keep on attention when they solve animal puzzles, and also when they combine each part they need to have the ability to think logically.

Features
1. Contains more than 60 animal puzzles and their names
2. Phonics sound of the letter of the alphabet.
3. Introduce all simple letters in English with their phonics
4. Wonderful and beautiful background that relates to the living environment of every animal
5. Cute animal cartoon illustrations.
6. Sweet background music and sound.
7. Nice balloon popup when the kids have finished each puzzle.

The game is suitable for children under 5 years of age and this will be free with ads so children will not get annoyed during the game play.

Even for children with autism, these puzzles help them develop their memory, attention, logical thinking, fine hand motor skills and just entertain children.

This is a game with the best graphics so kids can enjoy it. Learning is going to be fun playing with animal puzzles.
descriptionShort: Kids learn alphabets and their phonics sound while playing with animals puzzles.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Added New game feature “Find the animal using phonics sound”
From this feature kids has to find animals, according their phonic sounds of it’ first letter.
This nice and enjoyable educational game feature.
2. Fixed small bugs
3. Updated shadow images.
